tasks.title: C2FT-004 Genset Issues with DB251
tasks.description: A test using bowsers other than the FON units (DB251 and DB252) was requested and is still pending.

tasks.title: DB248 without FMS
tasks.description: RGM did not have the bowser ready for the scheduled GAFS support. The next available support slot is on 16/07/2025 at 13:00 Hrs SAST (08:00 Hrs SRT).

tasks.title: Fake Bypass alarm fixing
tasks.description: A new automation update for the pump controller by the GVR Team was recently deployed. The Truck Prime UX installed in DB251 and DB252 is triggering a bypass alarm every time refueling starts. When one pump turns off, the system mistakenly identifies it as a bypass. A fix has been requested from GVR to ensure real alarms are accurately detected.

tasks.title: Vincent's training progress
tasks.description: This week we are covering the Diesel Reconciliation Process. Next week, he will focus on Consumption Reports.
